text: Otoko no shinja mo on'na no shinja mo, tagaini nakamadearu. Kare-ra wa tadashī koto o susume, jaaku o kinjiru. Mata reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, arrā to sono shito ni shitagau. Korera no mono ni, arrā wa jihi o ataeru. Hontōni arrā wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
